reviews.customers_say: Customers find the tunic comfortable and flattering, particularly noting how it hugs curves just right and can be dressed up or down. The fit is loose in all the right places, and they appreciate the soft, heavy t-shirt material that's almost fuzzy on the inside. While some customers find the sizing accurate, others report that it's way off. The material quality receives mixed feedback, with some praising the fabric

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy two
items.body: I bought this shirt in white, then again in green. The fit is PERFECT. Material is soft and comfortable. Cute color options. Material is the perfect density so you're not hot/cold. I love them both. Read more
items.author: JAG2MOM

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE!! Highly recommend!
items.body: So cute- loved it after getting my first one, ordered 12 more!!! Itâ€™s so versatile, dressed up or down. Top is a loose on top, more fitted on bottom. Neckline is â€œboatneckâ€, wide enough to wear one side off shoulder but will stay up for regular wear. The fabric doesnâ€™t feel thin or cheap, good quality, soft and nice weight. Great length options , pull down to cover bum or gather it up for cute fitted waist! Love the all color options. Iâ€™ve machine washed in cold and hung dry several times, with zero issues. I am 135lbs, 36-27-34, ordered Small and it fits perfectly. I ordered a Medium for comparison, but was too loose and not as flattering as the small. I get a great off the shoulder look with the fit of size small! I ordered color â€œ wine redâ€ and returned. The color is more orange red ,not deep and rich like the picture, personal preference. *Side Note* Make sure to try on EACH top individually, to be within the return window if needed ! I found sizing/fit can be inconsistent, both smaller and larger within the same order. The navy was labeled â€œSâ€, but the fit was noticeably loose & sloppy while the red was slightly more fitted. The material can vary between colors, which may effect fit and sizing. Hope this helps! Read more
items.author: Monique

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fits wonderfully
items.body: Thin sweater but cute and comfortable Read more
items.author: Great replacement cord

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars PERFECTLY SOFT AND SIZED ðŸ’™ beautiful blue
items.body: Beautiful SOFT material that fits perfectly. I washed warm and laid flat to air dry. I will dry on low heat next time because there was no shrinkage and was a little too loose. I ordered a small and Iâ€™m 5â€™2â€ 115lbs. HOWEVER, it hung beautifully loose off the shoulder, not too high or low. Perfect. SUPER SOFT, romantic weekend ready. Easily tucked into jeans. I canâ€™t say enough positive things about this sweater. Ordering more colors! Read more
items.author: K

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful quality!
items.body: I absolutely love this shirt. It is true to size and is so adorable on. The material is soft and comfy. I have dresses this up with black slacks and heals and I've dressed it down with black leggings and jeans. My only concern is that the picture seems iron on and I'm afraid with washing and drying that it'll start to peel off. To avoid this I do not dry the shirt and hang dry it. I think it may even say to hand wash. I do not have time for this as I am a busy woman (aren't we all). I have washed it and worn it at least 5 times since I received the shirt and so far I do not see any signs of the picture peeling or cracking. This is so cute and really worth the money. I can't wait to order another one with a different picture for next year. Read more
items.author: Erin Booher

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars not oversized
items.body: I ordered a small which was the recommended size for me. It's cute and fit but it's not oversized like it claims. I would order bigger for the oversized fit uf that's what you are looking for Read more
items.author: Sue Eiland

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this Sweater
items.body: I got this in a size up, 2X because I wanted it to be nice and slouchy for off the shoulder. I really love the fit. It gives some concealment without bulk around the tummy. It can be dressed up or down. The color is true to the pic and the fabric is soft, light-weight but does not feel cheap. I am definitely going to get one in black. Great look for a dressy yoga or jeans. Read more
items.author: TB Newton

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and stylish
items.body: Gorgeous top! Iâ€™m a size 12 and originally purchased a large. It fit but I wanted it a bit roomier so returned it for an x-large. Iâ€™m 5â€™7 and itâ€™s a great length. Covers my bottom! Very light weight and wearable. It arrive with some wrinkles but I easily got them out. The neckline allowed me to wear off of one shoulder comfortably. Great purchase! Read more
items.author: Kell Bell

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Off Shoulder is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Off Shoulder is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Off Shoulder is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Blackish Green, Creamy White, E-lightgray, Black Three Pumpkin Printed, Burgundy, Khaki Pink, Grey Blue, D0 Christmas Tree, Black, Coffee, Navy Blue, Orange, Deep Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
